content.query:
SELECT TOP 100 year,month
                ,tz.borough
                ,CONVERT(DATE,lpep_pickup_datetime) As 'trip_date'
                ,c.day_name as trip_day
                ,CASE WHEN c.day_name in ('Satruday','Sunday') THEN 'Y'  ELSE 'N' END as trip_day_weekend
                
                
from [Silver].[vw_trip_data_green_patitioned_table] as td
INNER JOIN Silver.taxi_zone tz ON td.pu_location_id=tz.location_id
INNER JOIN Silver.calendar c on c.date=CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime)




select * from Silver.taxi_zone
